00051 void CmtDeviceConfiguration::readFromMessage(const void* message)
00052 {
00053         xsens::Message msg((const uint8_t*) message,0);
00054 
00055         m_masterDeviceId = msg.getDataLong(0);
00056         m_samplingPeriod = msg.getDataShort(4);
00057         m_outputSkipFactor = msg.getDataShort(6);
00058         m_syncinMode = msg.getDataShort(8);
00059         m_syncinSkipFactor = msg.getDataShort(10);
00060         m_syncinOffset = msg.getDataLong(12);
00061         memcpy(m_date,msg.getDataBuffer(16),8);
00062         memcpy(m_time,msg.getDataBuffer(24),8);
00063         memcpy(m_reservedForHost,msg.getDataBuffer(32),32);
00064         memcpy(m_reservedForClient,msg.getDataBuffer(64),32);
00065         m_numberOfDevices = msg.getDataShort(96);
00066 
00067         for (uint16_t i = 0; i < m_numberOfDevices; ++i)
00068         {
00069                 m_deviceInfo[i].m_deviceId = msg.getDataLong(98+i*20);
00070                 m_deviceInfo[i].m_dataLength = msg.getDataShort(102+i*20);
00071                 m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputMode = msg.getDataShort(104+i*20);
00072                 m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputSettings = msg.getDataLong(106+i*20);
00073                 memcpy(m_deviceInfo[i].m_reserved,msg.getDataBuffer(110+i*20),8);
00074         }
00075 }

00078 // Compute the period and skip factor.
00079 void CmtDeviceMode::getPeriodAndSkipFactor(uint16_t& period,uint16_t& skip) const
00080 {
00081         if (m_sampleFrequency == 0)
00082         {
00083                 period = 0;
00084                 skip = 0;
00085                 return;
00086         }
00087         if (m_sampleFrequency >= 512)
00088         {
00089                 period = 225;
00090                 skip = 0;
00091                 return;
00092         }
00093 
00094         int32_t freq, sf = m_sampleFrequency;
00095 
00096         // first try the simple ones
00097         skip = 0;
00098         freq = sf;
00099         while (freq < 100)
00100         {
00101                 ++skip;
00102                 freq += sf;
00103         }
00104 
00105         period = (uint16_t) (115200 / freq);
00106 }
00107 
00109 // Return the real sample frequency in Hz
00110 double CmtDeviceMode::getRealSampleFrequency(void) const
00111 {
00112         uint16_t skip, period;
00113         getPeriodAndSkipFactor(period,skip);
00114         return (115200.0 / ((1.0 + (double) skip) * (double) period));
00115 }
00116 
00118 // Compute sample frequency from the period and skip factor.
00119 void CmtDeviceMode::setPeriodAndSkipFactor(uint16_t period, uint16_t skip)
00120 {
00121         m_sampleFrequency = (uint16_t) floor((115200.0 / ((1.0 + (double) skip) * (double) period))+0.5);
00122 }
00123 
00125 // Compute sample frequency from the period and skip factor.
00126 bool CmtDeviceMode::operator == (const CmtDeviceMode& dev) const
00127 {
00128         return m_outputMode == dev.m_outputMode && m_outputSettings == dev.m_outputSettings && m_sampleFrequency == dev.m_sampleFrequency;
00129 }

00132 // Return the real sample frequency in Hz
00133 double CmtDeviceMode2::getRealSampleFrequency(void) const
00134 {
00135         if (m_skip != 0xFFFF)
00136                 return (115200.0 / ((1.0 + (double) m_skip) * (double) m_period));
00137         else
00138                 return (115200.0 / ((double) m_period));
00139 }

00142 // Return the sample frequency in Hz
00143 uint16_t CmtDeviceMode2::getSampleFrequency(void) const
00144 {
00145         if (m_skip != 0xFFFF)
00146                 return (uint16_t) floor((115200.0 / ((1.0 + (double) m_skip) * (double) m_period))+0.5);
00147         else
00148                 return (uint16_t) floor((115200.0 / ((double) m_period))+0.5);
00149 }

00188 // Common part of a data request function
00189 #define DO_DATA_REQUEST_BID(req,bid)\
00190         Message snd(req,0);\
00191         Message rcv;\
00192         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID || bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)\
00193                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);\
00194         if (!m_readFromFile)\
00195         {\
00196                 snd.setBusId(bid);\
00197                 m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);\
00198                 if ((m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,req+1,0,true)) != XRV_OK)\
00199                         return m_lastResult;\
00200                 if (m_logging)\
00201                         m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);\
00202                 if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)\
00203                 {       m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;\
00204                         if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)\
00205                         {\
00206                                 uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);\
00207                                 getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);\
00208                         }\
00209                         return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();\
00210                 }\
00211         }\
00212         else\
00213         while (1)\
00214         {\
00215                 if ((m_lastResult = m_logFile.readMessage(&rcv,req+1)) != XRV_OK)\
00216                         return m_lastResult;\
00217                 if (rcv.getBusId() == bid || (rcv.getBusId() == 1 && bid == CMT_BID_MASTER))\
00218                         break;\
00219         }
00220 
00221 #define DO_DATA_REQUEST(req)\
00222         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);\
00223         DO_DATA_REQUEST_BID(req,bid);
00224 
00226 // Common part of a serial data set function
00227 #define DO_DATA_SET_BID(req,size,type,data,bid)\
00228         Message snd(req,size);\
00229         Message rcv;\
00230         snd.setData ## type (data);\
00231         if (bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)\
00232         {\
00233                 for (uint8_t i=0;i<m_config.m_numberOfDevices;++i)\
00234                 {\
00235                         snd.setBusId(i+1);\
00236                         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);\
00237                         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,req+1,0,true);\
00238                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)\
00239                                 return m_lastResult;\
00240                         if (m_logging)\
00241                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);\

00245                                 {\
00246                                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);\
00247                                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);\
00248                                 }\
00249                                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();\
00250                         }\
00251                 }\
00252         } else {\
00253                 snd.setBusId(bid);\
00254                 m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);\
00255                 m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,req+1,0,true);\
00256                 if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)\
00257                         return m_lastResult;\
00258                 if (m_logging)\

00266                         }\

00268                 }\
00269         }
00270 
00271 #define DO_DATA_SET(req,size,type,data)\
00272         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);\
00273         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID)\
00274                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);\
00275         DO_DATA_SET_BID(req,size,type,data,bid);
00276 
00277 #define HANDLE_ERR_RESULT\
00278         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)\

00331 // Close the serial communication port.

00351 void Cmt3::fillRtc(Packet* pack)
00352 {
00353 #if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_LOG_ALWAYS)
00354         TimeStamp rt = 0;
00355 #endif
00356 
00357         if (!m_rtcInitialized)
00358         {
00359                 m_rtcStart = pack->m_toa;
00360                 m_rtcLastSc = pack->getSampleCounter();
00361                 m_rtcCount = m_rtcLastSc;
00362 #ifdef _CORRECT_FOR_CLOCK_MISMATCH
00363                 m_lastToaTouch = m_rtcLastSc;
00364 #endif
00365                 CmtDeviceMode2 mode;
00366                 mode.m_period = m_period;
00367                 mode.m_skip = m_skip;
00368                 m_rtcMsPerSample = 1000.0 / mode.getRealSampleFrequency();
00369                 pack->m_rtc = m_rtcStart;
00370                 m_rtcInitialized = true;
00371         }
00372         else
00373         {
00374                 CmtMtTimeStamp sc = pack->getSampleCounter();
00375                 CmtMtTimeStamp scdiff = sc - m_rtcLastSc;
00376                 m_rtcLastSc = sc;
00377                 m_rtcCount += scdiff;
00378                 pack->m_rtc = m_rtcStart + (TimeStamp) floor(m_rtcMsPerSample * (double) m_rtcCount + 0.5);
00379 #ifdef _CORRECT_FOR_CLOCK_MISMATCH
00380 #if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_LOG_ALWAYS)
00381                 rt = pack->m_rtc;
00382 #endif
00383                 // detect if arrival times are lower than expected
00384                 // if so, we update the start time to correct for this
00385                 if (pack->m_toa < pack->m_rtc)
00386                 {
00387                         m_lastToaTouch = m_rtcCount;
00388                         // adjust start time to match new, earlier TOA
00389                         TimeStamp diff = pack->m_rtc - pack->m_toa;
00390 
00391                         m_rtcStart -= diff;
00392                         pack->m_rtc = pack->m_toa;
00393                 }
00394                 else if (pack->m_toa == pack->m_rtc)
00395                         m_lastToaTouch = m_rtcCount;
00396                 else if (((m_rtcCount-m_lastToaTouch) & 127) == 0)
00397                         ++m_rtcStart;   // we adjust the start time upwards by max 1ms per 128 samples
00398 #endif
00399         }
00400         //CMT3LOG(__FUNCTION__ " rtcStart: %I64u rtcPack: %I64u toa: %I64u\n",m_rtcStart,pack->m_rtc,pack->m_toa);
00401 //      CMT3LOG("%I64u %I64u %I64u %I64u 101010101 %u\n",m_rtcStart,rt,pack->m_toa,pack->m_rtc,(long) this);
00402 }

00457 // Retrieve the BusId of a device.
00458 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getBusId (uint8_t& busId, const CmtDeviceId deviceId) const
00459 {
00460         CMT3LOG("L3: getBusId %08x\n",deviceId);
00461         CMT3EXITLOG;
00462 
00463         if (deviceId == CMT_DID_MASTER || deviceId == m_config.m_masterDeviceId)
00464         {
00465                 busId = CMT_BID_MASTER;
00466                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
00467         }
00468 
00469         for (uint16_t i=0 ; i <= m_config.m_numberOfDevices ; ++i)
00470                 if (m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_deviceId == deviceId)
00471                 {
00472                         busId = i+1;
00473                         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
00474                 }
00475         return m_lastResult = XRV_NOTFOUND;
00476 }

00479 uint8_t Cmt3::getBusIdInternal(const CmtDeviceId devId) const
00480 {
00481         if (devId == CMT_DID_MASTER)
00482                 return CMT_BID_MASTER;
00483 
00484         if (devId == CMT_DID_BROADCAST)
00485                 return CMT_BID_BROADCAST;
00486 
00487         if (m_config.m_masterDeviceId == devId)
00488                 return CMT_BID_MASTER;
00489 
00490         for (uint16_t i = 0;i <= m_config.m_numberOfDevices;++i)
00491         {
00492                 if (m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_deviceId == devId)
00493                         return (uint8_t) (i+1);
00494         }
00495         return CMT_BID_INVALID;
00496 }

00523 // Retrieve the complete device configuration of a device.
00524 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getConfiguration(CmtDeviceConfiguration& configuration)
00525 {
00526         CMT3LOG("L3: getConfiguration\n");
00527         CMT3EXITLOG;
00528 
00529         if (!(m_serial.isOpen() || m_logFile.isOpen()))
00530                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
00531         
00532         memcpy(&configuration,&m_config,sizeof(CmtDeviceConfiguration));
00533 
00534         if (m_logging)
00535         {
00536                 // fake the message receipt
00537                 Message msg(CMT_MID_CONFIGURATION,98 + CMT_CONF_BLOCKLEN*m_config.m_numberOfDevices);
00538                 msg.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
00539                 
00540                 msg.setDataLong(m_config.m_masterDeviceId, 0);
00541                 msg.setDataShort(m_config.m_samplingPeriod, 4);
00542                 msg.setDataShort(m_config.m_outputSkipFactor, 6);
00543                 msg.setDataShort(m_config.m_syncinMode, 8);
00544                 msg.setDataShort(m_config.m_syncinSkipFactor, 10);
00545                 msg.setDataLong(m_config.m_syncinOffset, 12);
00546                 memcpy(msg.getDataBuffer(16), m_config.m_date,8);
00547                 memcpy(msg.getDataBuffer(24), m_config.m_time, 8);
00548                 memcpy(msg.getDataBuffer(32), m_config.m_reservedForHost,32);
00549                 memcpy(msg.getDataBuffer(64), m_config.m_reservedForClient,32);
00550                 msg.setDataShort(m_config.m_numberOfDevices, 96);
00551 
00552                 for (uint16_t i = 0; i < m_config.m_numberOfDevices; ++i)
00553                 {
00554                         msg.setDataLong(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_deviceId, 98+i*20);
00555                         msg.setDataShort(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_dataLength, 102+i*20);
00556                         msg.setDataShort(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputMode, 104+i*20);
00557                         msg.setDataLong(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputSettings, 106+i*20);
00558                         memcpy(msg.getDataBuffer(110+i*20), m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_reserved,8);
00559                 }
00560 
00561                 msg.recomputeChecksum();
00562 
00563                 writeMessageToLogFile(msg);
00564         }
00565         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
00566 }

00581 // Return the number of connected devices. Returns 0 if not connected.
00582 uint32_t Cmt3::getDeviceCount (void) const
00583 {
00584         CMT3LOG("L3: getDeviceCount\n");
00585         if (m_serial.isOpen() || m_logFile.isOpen())
00586         {
00587                 if (isXm())
00588                         return m_config.m_numberOfDevices + 1;
00589                 else
00590                         return m_config.m_numberOfDevices;
00591         }
00592         return 0;

00596 // Retrieve the CmtDeviceId of the device at the given BusId 
00597 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getDeviceId(const uint8_t busId, CmtDeviceId& deviceId) const
00598 {
00599         CMT3LOG("L3: getDeviceId %u\n",(uint32_t) busId);
00600         CMT3EXITLOG;
00601 
00602         if (busId == CMT_BID_MASTER || busId == 0)
00603                 deviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
00604         else
00605         {
00606                 if (busId > m_config.m_numberOfDevices)
00607                         return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID;
00608                 deviceId = m_config.m_deviceInfo[busId-1].m_deviceId;
00609         }
00610         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
00611 }

00614 // Retrieve the complete device output mode of a device.
00615 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getDeviceMode(CmtDeviceMode& mode, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
00616 {
00617         CMT3LOG("L3: getDeviceMode %08x\n",deviceId);
00618         CMT3EXITLOG;
00619 
00620         CmtDeviceMode2 mode2;
00621         XsensResultValue rv;
00622         rv = getDeviceMode2(mode2, deviceId);
00623         if (rv == XRV_OK) {
00624                 mode.m_outputMode = mode2.m_outputMode;
00625                 mode.m_outputSettings = mode2.m_outputSettings;
00626                 mode.m_sampleFrequency = mode2.getSampleFrequency();
00627         }
00628         return rv;
00629 }
00630 
00632 // Retrieve the complete device output mode of a device.
00633 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getDeviceMode2(CmtDeviceMode2& mode, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
00634 {
00635         CMT3LOG("L3: getDeviceMode2 %08x\n",deviceId);
00636         CMT3EXITLOG;
00637 
00638         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
00639         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID)
00640                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID;
00641         if (bid == 0)
00642                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID;
00643         if (bid == CMT_BID_MASTER)
00644                 bid = 1;
00645 
00646         mode.m_period = m_period;
00647         mode.m_skip = m_skip;
00648         //mode.m_sampleFrequency = (uint16_t) floor(m_sampleFrequency+0.5);
00649         mode.m_outputMode = m_config.m_deviceInfo[bid-1].m_outputMode;
00650         mode.m_outputSettings = m_config.m_deviceInfo[bid-1].m_outputSettings;
00651         
00652         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
00653 }
00654 
00656 // Retrieve the eMts data of the specified sensor(s)
00657 #define _XM_SMALL_PACKETS_EMTS 0
00658 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getEMtsData(void* buffer, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
00659 {
00660         CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData %p %08x\n",buffer,deviceId);
00661         CMT3EXITLOG;
00662 
00663         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
00664         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID)
00665                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID;
00666         if (!m_readFromFile && !m_serial.isOpen())
00667                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOPORTOPEN;
00668         if (m_readFromFile && !m_logFile.isOpen())
00669                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOFILEOPEN;
00670         if (buffer == NULL)
00671                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NULLPTR;
00672                 
00673         if (bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
00674         {
00675                 memset(buffer,0,m_config.m_numberOfDevices * CMT_EMTS_SIZE);
00676                 uint8_t* buf = (uint8_t*) buffer;
00677                 // loop over devices and request emts data for all of them
00678                 for (uint32_t dev=0; dev < m_config.m_numberOfDevices; ++dev)
00679                         if (getEMtsData(buf+dev*CMT_EMTS_SIZE,m_config.m_deviceInfo[dev].m_deviceId) != XRV_OK)
00680                                 return m_lastResult;
00681                 //CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData (%08x) returns %d\n",deviceId,(int32_t)m_lastResult);
00682                 return m_lastResult;
00683         }
00684 
00685         uint8_t dataIndex;
00686 
00687         if (isXm())
00688         {
00689                 if (bid == CMT_BID_MASTER)
00690                 {
00691                         //CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData (%08x) returns XRV_INVALIDID\n",deviceId);
00692                         return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID;
00693                 }
00694                 dataIndex = bid-1;
00695         }
00696         else
00697                 dataIndex = 0;          // when we have a single MT, we should use bank 0
00698 
00699         if (m_eMtsData[dataIndex] == NULL)
00700         {
00701                 m_eMtsData[dataIndex] = malloc(CMT_EMTS_SIZE);
00702 
00703                 // Xbus requires small data packets
00704 #if _XM_SMALL_PACKETS_EMTS
00705                 if (isXm())
00706                 {
00707                         Message msg(CMT_MID_REQEMTS,3);
00708                         Message rcv;
00709                         uint8_t* tme = (uint8_t*) m_eMtsData[dataIndex];
00710                         memset(tme,0,CMT_EMTS_SIZE);    // clear eMTS data
00711                         msg.setBusId(bid);
00712                         msg.setDataByte(0,0);                   // read bank 0
00713                         uint16_t emtPos = 0;
00714                         for (uint8_t page=0;page < 4;++page)    // read all 4 pages, one at a time
00715                         {
00716                                 msg.setDataByte(page,1);
00717                                 for (uint8_t part=0;part < 4;++part, ++emtPos)
00718                                 {
00719                                         if (!m_readFromFile)
00720                                         {
00721                                                 msg.setDataByte(part,2);
00722                                                 m_serial.writeMessage(&msg);
00723                                                 m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_EMTSDATA,0,false);
00724                                         }
00725                                         else
00726                                                 m_lastResult = m_logFile.readMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_EMTSDATA);
00727 
00728                                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
00729                                         {
00730                                                 FREENUL(m_eMtsData[dataIndex]);
00731                                                 //CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData (%08x) returns %d\n",deviceId,(int32_t)m_lastResult);
00732                                                 return m_lastResult;
00733                                         }
00734                                         if (!m_readFromFile && m_logging)
00735                                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
00736                                         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
00737                                         {
00738                                                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
00739                                                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
00740                                                 {
00741                                                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
00742                                                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
00743                                                 }
00744                                                 m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte(0);
00745                                                 FREENUL(m_eMtsData[dataIndex]);
00746                                                 //CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData (%08x) returns %d\n",deviceId,(int32_t)m_lastResult);
00747                                                 return m_lastResult;
00748                                         }
00749 
00750                                         memcpy(tme+(emtPos*66),rcv.getDataBuffer(),66);
00751                                 }
00752                         }
00753                 }       // if (isXm())
00754                 else    // single MT, ask in one packet
00755                 {
00756 #endif
00757                         Message msg(CMT_MID_REQEMTS,2);
00758                         Message rcv;
00759                         memset(m_eMtsData[dataIndex],0,CMT_EMTS_SIZE);  // clear eMTS data
00760                         msg.setBusId(bid);
00761                         msg.setDataByte(0,0);   // read bank 0
00762                         msg.setDataByte(255,1); // read all pages
00763 
00764                         if (!m_readFromFile)
00765                         {
00766                                 m_serial.writeMessage(&msg);
00767                                 m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_EMTSDATA,0,false);
00768                         }
00769                         else
00770                                 m_lastResult = m_logFile.readMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_EMTSDATA);
00771                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
00772                         {
00773                                 FREENUL(m_eMtsData[dataIndex]);
00774                                 //CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData (%08x) returns %d\n",deviceId,(int32_t)m_lastResult);
00775                                 return m_lastResult;
00776                         }
00777                         if (!m_readFromFile && m_logging)
00778                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
00779                         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
00780                         {
00781                                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
00782                                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
00783                                 {
00784                                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
00785                                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
00786                                 }
00787                                 m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte(0);
00788                                 FREENUL(m_eMtsData[dataIndex]);
00789                                 //CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData (%08x) returns %d\n",deviceId,(int32_t)m_lastResult);
00790                                 return m_lastResult;
00791                         }
00792 
00793                         memcpy(m_eMtsData[dataIndex],rcv.getDataBuffer(),CMT_EMTS_SIZE);
00794 #if _XM_SMALL_PACKETS_EMTS
00795                 }
00796 #endif
00797         } else if (m_logging)
00798         {
00799                 // fake the message receipt
00800                 Message msg(CMT_MID_EMTSDATA,CMT_EMTS_SIZE);
00801                 msg.setBusId(bid);
00802                 msg.setDataBuffer((const uint8_t*) m_eMtsData[dataIndex],0,CMT_EMTS_SIZE);
00803                 writeMessageToLogFile(msg);
00804         }
00805 
00806         memcpy(buffer,m_eMtsData[dataIndex],CMT_EMTS_SIZE);
00807         //CMT3LOG("L3: getEMtsData (%08x) returns XRV_OK\n",deviceId);
00808         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
00809 }
00810 
00812 // Retrieve the error mode
00813 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getErrorMode(uint16_t& mode, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
00814 {
00815         CMT3LOG("L3: getErrorMode %08x\n",deviceId);
00816         CMT3EXITLOG;
00817 
00818         if (isXm())
00819         {
00820                 DO_DATA_REQUEST_BID(CMT_MID_REQXMERRORMODE,CMT_BID_MASTER);
00821                 mode = rcv.getDataShort();
00822         }
00823         else
00824         {
00825                 DO_DATA_REQUEST(CMT_MID_REQERRORMODE);
00826                 mode = rcv.getDataShort();
00827         }
00828         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
00829 }

00836 {
00837         Message snd;

01028 // Retrieve the CmtDeviceId of the MT device with the given index
01029 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getMtDeviceId (const uint8_t index, CmtDeviceId& deviceId) const
01030 {
01031         CMT3LOG("L3: getMtDeviceId %u\n",(uint32_t) index);
01032         CMT3EXITLOG;
01033 
01034         if (index >= m_config.m_numberOfDevices)
01035                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDPARAM;
01036         deviceId = m_config.m_deviceInfo[index].m_deviceId;
01037         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;

01040 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getObjectAlignmentMatrix(CmtMatrix& matrix, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
01041 {
01042         CMT3LOG("L3: getObjectAlignmentMatrix %08x\n",deviceId);
01043         CMT3EXITLOG;
01044 
01045         DO_DATA_REQUEST(CMT_MID_REQOBJECTALIGNMENT);
01046         matrix.m_data[0][0] = rcv.getDataFloat(0);
01047         matrix.m_data[0][1] = rcv.getDataFloat(4);
01048         matrix.m_data[0][2] = rcv.getDataFloat(8);
01049         matrix.m_data[1][0] = rcv.getDataFloat(12);
01050         matrix.m_data[1][1] = rcv.getDataFloat(16);
01051         matrix.m_data[1][2] = rcv.getDataFloat(20);
01052         matrix.m_data[2][0] = rcv.getDataFloat(24);
01053         matrix.m_data[2][1] = rcv.getDataFloat(28);
01054         matrix.m_data[2][2] = rcv.getDataFloat(32);
01055         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01056 }

01109 // Get the baudrate that is reported for the serial connection
01110 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getSerialBaudrate(uint32_t& baudrate)
01111 {
01112         CMT3LOG("L3: getSerialBaudrate\n");
01113         CMT3EXITLOG;
01114 
01115         DO_DATA_REQUEST_BID(CMT_MID_REQBAUDRATE,CMT_BID_MASTER);
01116         switch (rcv.getDataByte())
01117         {
01118         case CMT_BAUDCODE_9K6:
01119                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_9600;
01120                 break;
01121 //      case CMT_BAUDCODE_14K4:
01122 //              baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_14K4;
01123 //              break;
01124         case CMT_BAUDCODE_19K2:
01125                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_19K2;
01126                 break;
01127 //      case CMT_BAUDCODE_28K8:
01128 //              baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_28K8;
01129 //              break;
01130         case CMT_BAUDCODE_38K4:
01131                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_38K4;
01132                 break;
01133         case CMT_BAUDCODE_57K6:
01134                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_57K6;
01135                 break;
01136 //      case CMT_BAUDCODE_76K8:
01137 //              baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_76K8;
01138 //              break;
01139         case CMT_BAUDCODE_115K2:
01140                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_115K2;
01141                 break;
01142         case CMT_BAUDCODE_230K4:
01143                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_230K4;
01144                 break;
01145         case CMT_BAUDCODE_460K8:
01146                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_460K8;
01147                 break;
01148         case CMT_BAUDCODE_921K6:
01149                 baudrate = CMT_BAUD_RATE_921K6;
01150                 break;
01151         default:
01152                 return m_lastResult = XRV_BAUDRATEINVALID;
01153         }
01154         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01155 }
01156 
01158 // Retrieve the inbound synchronization settings of a device.
01159 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getSyncInSettings(CmtSyncInSettings& settings)
01160 {
01161         CMT3LOG("L3: getSyncInSettings\n");
01162         CMT3EXITLOG;
01163 
01164         Message snd(CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGS,1);
01165         Message rcv;
01166 
01167         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
01168 
01169         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCIN_MODE);
01170         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01171         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01172         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01173                 return m_lastResult;
01174         if (m_logging)
01175                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01176         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01177         settings.m_mode = rcv.getDataShort(1);
01178 
01179         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCIN_SKIPFACTOR);
01180         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01181         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01182         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01183                 return m_lastResult;
01184         if (m_logging)
01185                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01186         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01187         settings.m_skipFactor = rcv.getDataShort(1);
01188 
01189         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCIN_OFFSET);
01190         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01191         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01192         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01193                 return m_lastResult;
01194         if (m_logging)
01195                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01196         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01197         settings.m_offset = rcv.getDataLong(1);
01198         
01199         // convert the offset to ns
01200         settings.m_offset = (uint32_t) ((((double)settings.m_offset)*CMT_SYNC_CLOCK_TICKS_TO_NS)+0.5);
01201 
01202         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01203 }
01204 
01206 // Retrieve the inbound synchronization mode of a device.
01207 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getSyncInMode(uint16_t& mode)
01208 {
01209         CMT3LOG("L3: getSyncInMode\n");
01210         CMT3EXITLOG;
01211 
01212         Message snd(CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGS,1);
01213         Message rcv;
01214 
01215         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
01216 
01217         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCIN_MODE);
01218         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01219         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01220         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01221                 return m_lastResult;
01222         if (m_logging)
01223                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01224         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01225         mode = rcv.getDataShort(1);
01226 
01227         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01228 }

01296 // Retrieve the outbound synchronization settings of a device.
01297 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getSyncOutSettings(CmtSyncOutSettings& settings)
01298 {
01299         CMT3LOG("L3: getSyncOutSettings\n");
01300         CMT3EXITLOG;
01301 
01302         Message snd(CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGS,1);
01303         Message rcv;
01304 
01305         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
01306 
01307         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_MODE);
01308         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01309         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01310         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01311                 return m_lastResult;
01312         if (m_logging)
01313                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01314         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01315         settings.m_mode = rcv.getDataShort(1);
01316 
01317         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_SKIPFACTOR);
01318         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01319         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01320         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01321                 return m_lastResult;
01322         if (m_logging)
01323                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01324         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01325         settings.m_skipFactor = rcv.getDataShort(1);
01326 
01327         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_OFFSET);
01328         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01329         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01330         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01331                 return m_lastResult;
01332         if (m_logging)
01333                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01334         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01335         settings.m_offset = rcv.getDataLong(1);
01336         
01337         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_PULSEWIDTH);
01338         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01339         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
01340         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01341                 return m_lastResult;
01342         if (m_logging)
01343                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01344         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01345         settings.m_pulseWidth = rcv.getDataLong(1);
01346 
01347         // convert the offset and pulse width to ns
01348         settings.m_offset = (uint32_t)  ((((double)settings.m_offset)*CMT_SYNC_CLOCK_TICKS_TO_NS)+0.5);
01349         settings.m_pulseWidth = (uint32_t)      ((((double)settings.m_pulseWidth)*CMT_SYNC_CLOCK_TICKS_TO_NS)+0.5);
01350 
01351         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01352 }

01486 // Retrieve the UTC time of the last received sample
01487 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getUtcTime(CmtUtcTime& utc, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
01488 {
01489         CMT3LOG("L3: getUtcTime %08x\n",deviceId);
01490         CMT3EXITLOG;
01491 
01492         DO_DATA_REQUEST(CMT_MID_REQUTCTIME);
01493 
01494         utc.m_nano      = rcv.getDataLong(0);
01495         utc.m_year      = rcv.getDataShort(4);
01496         utc.m_month     = rcv.getDataByte(6);
01497         utc.m_day       = rcv.getDataByte(7);
01498         utc.m_hour      = rcv.getDataByte(8);
01499         utc.m_minute= rcv.getDataByte(9);
01500         utc.m_second= rcv.getDataByte(10);
01501         utc.m_valid     = rcv.getDataByte(11);
01502 
01503 //      if (utc.m_valid == 0)
01504 //              return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALID_TIME;
01505 
01506         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01507 }

01520 
01522 // Place all connected sensors into Configuration Mode.
01523 XsensResultValue Cmt3::gotoConfig(void)
01524 {
01525         CMT3LOG("L3: gotoConfig port %u\n",(uint32_t)m_serial.getCmt1s()->getPortNr());
01526         CMT3EXITLOG;
01527 
01528         Message snd(CMT_MID_GOTOCONFIG);
01529         Message rcv;
01530         int32_t tries = 0;
01531 
01532         srand( (unsigned int)timeStampNow());
01533 
01534         m_serial.setTimeout(CMT3_CONFIG_TIMEOUT);
01535         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
01536         while (tries++ < m_gotoConfigTries)
01537         {
01538                 m_serial.getCmt1s()->flushData();                       // special case for goto config. we want the buffer to be empty
01539                 CMT3LOG("L3: Attempt to goto config %d\n",tries);
01540                 m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01541                 m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_GOTOCONFIGACK,0,false);
01542 #ifndef _PRODUCTION // Production version must retry on nodata, normal versions do not.
01543                 if (m_lastResult == XRV_TIMEOUTNODATA)
01544                         break;
01545 #endif
01546                 if (m_lastResult == XRV_OK)
01547                 {
01548                         if (m_logging)
01549                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01550                         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
01551                         {
01552                                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = CMT_DID_MASTER;
01553                                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
01554                                 {
01555                                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
01556                                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
01557                                 }
01558                                 m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte(0);
01559                                 CMT3LOG("L3: Goto config failed, error received %d: %s\n",(int32_t)m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01560                                 m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutConf);
01561                                 return m_lastResult;
01562                         }
01563                         CMT3LOG("L3: Goto config succeeded\n");
01564                         m_measuring = false;
01565                         m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutConf);
01566                         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01567                 }
01568                 m_lastResult = m_serial.getLastResult();
01569                 msleep(((long)rand() * 10)/RAND_MAX);
01570         }
01571         m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutConf);
01572         m_measuring = (m_lastResult != XRV_OK);
01573         CMT3LOG("L3: Goto config returns %d: %s\n",(int32_t)m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01574         return m_lastResult;
01575 }
01576 
01578 // Place all connected sensors into Measurement Mode.
01579 XsensResultValue Cmt3::gotoMeasurement(void)
01580 {
01581         CMT3LOG("L3: gotoMeasurement port %u\n",(uint32_t)m_serial.getCmt1s()->getPortNr());
01582         CMT3EXITLOG;
01583 
01584         Message snd(CMT_MID_GOTOMEASUREMENT);
01585         Message rcv;
01586 
01587         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
01588 
01589         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01590         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_GOTOMEASUREMENTACK,0,false);
01591         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01592                 return m_lastResult;
01593         if (m_logging)
01594                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01595         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
01596 
01597         m_rtcInitialized = false;
01598         m_measuring = true;
01599         m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutMeas);
01600         return (m_lastResult = XRV_OK);
01601 }
01602 
01603 XsensResultValue Cmt3::initBus(void)
01604 {
01605         CMT3LOG("L3: initBus port %u\n",(uint32_t)m_serial.getCmt1s()->getPortNr());
01606         CMT3EXITLOG;
01607 
01608         DO_DATA_REQUEST_BID(CMT_MID_INITBUS,CMT_BID_MASTER);
01609         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;   // m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_INITBUSRESULTS);
01610 }
01611 
01613 // Return whether the main device is an Xbus Master or not.
01614 bool Cmt3::isXm(void) const
01615 {
01616         return ((m_config.m_masterDeviceId & CMT_DID_TYPEH_MASK) == CMT_DID_TYPEH_XM); 
01617 }
01618 
01620 // Open a communication channel to the given serial port name.
01621 XsensResultValue Cmt3::openPort(const char *portName, const uint32_t baudRate)
01622 {
01623         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort Opening port %s @baud %d, timeoutC=%u, timeoutM=%u\n", portName, baudRate, m_timeoutConf, m_timeoutMeas);
01624         CMT3EXITLOG;
01625         
01626         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
01627                 return m_lastResult = XRV_ALREADYOPEN;
01628                 
01629         m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutConf);
01630         if ((m_lastResult = m_serial.open(portName, baudRate)) != XRV_OK)
01631                 return m_lastResult;
01632         
01633         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: Low level port opened, gotoConfig\n");
01634 
01635     m_baudrate = baudRate;
01636     m_rtcInitialized = false;
01637     m_measuring = true;         // required for faster operation of refreshCache
01638     m_logging = false;
01639 
01640     // place the device in config mode
01641     if (gotoConfig() != XRV_OK)
01642     {
01643         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: gotoConfig failed: [%d]%s\n",m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01644         m_serial.close();
01645         return XRV_CONFIGCHECKFAIL;
01646     }
01647 
01648     CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: gotoConfig succeeded, requesting initBus\n");
01649     Message snd,rcv;
01650 
01651     if (initBus() != XRV_OK)
01652     {
01653         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: initBus failed: [%d]%s\n",m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01654         m_serial.close();
01655         return XRV_CONFIGCHECKFAIL;
01656     }
01657 
01658     CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: initBus succeeded, cleaning up the cache\n");
01659     if (refreshCache() != XRV_OK)
01660     {
01661         m_serial.close();
01662         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: refreshCache failed: [%d]%s\n",m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01663         return XRV_CONFIGCHECKFAIL;
01664     }
01665 
01666     CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: returning OK\n");
01667     return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01668 }
01669 
01670 #ifdef _WIN32
01672 // Open a communication channel to the given COM port number.
01673 XsensResultValue Cmt3::openPort(const uint32_t portNumber, const uint32_t baudRate)
01674 {
01675         // open the port
01676         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort Opening port %d @baud %d, timeoutC=%u, timeoutM=%u\n",(int32_t)portNumber,baudRate,m_timeoutConf, m_timeoutMeas);
01677         CMT3EXITLOG;
01678 
01679         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
01680                 return m_lastResult = XRV_ALREADYOPEN;
01681 
01682         m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutConf);     // then update L2 (and L1)
01683         if ((m_lastResult = m_serial.open(portNumber, baudRate)) != XRV_OK)
01684                 return m_lastResult;
01685 
01686         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: Low level port opened, gotoConfig\n");
01687 
01688         m_baudrate = baudRate;
01689         m_rtcInitialized = false;
01690         m_measuring = true;                     // required for faster operation of refreshCache
01691         m_logging = false;
01692 
01693         // place the device in config mode
01694         if (gotoConfig() != XRV_OK)
01695         {
01696                 CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: gotoConfig failed: [%d]%s\n",m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01697                 m_serial.close();
01698                 return XRV_CONFIGCHECKFAIL;
01699         }
01700 
01701         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: gotoConfig succeeded, requesting initBus\n");
01702         Message snd,rcv;
01703 
01704         if (initBus() != XRV_OK)
01705         {
01706                 CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: initBus failed: [%d]%s\n",m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01707                 m_serial.close();
01708                 return XRV_CONFIGCHECKFAIL;
01709         }
01710 
01711         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: initBus succeeded, cleaning up the cache\n");
01712         if (refreshCache() != XRV_OK)
01713         {
01714                 m_serial.close();
01715                 CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: refreshCache failed: [%d]%s\n",m_lastResult,xsensResultText(m_lastResult));
01716                 return XRV_CONFIGCHECKFAIL;
01717         }
01718 
01719         CMT3LOG("L3: openPort: returning OK\n");
01720         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01721 }
01722 #endif
01723 
01725 // Get the MessageId of the next logged message
01726 XsensResultValue Cmt3::peekLogMessageId(uint8_t& messageId)
01727 {
01728         CMT3LOG("L3: peekLogMessageId started\n");
01729         CMT3EXITLOG;
01730 
01731         if (!m_readFromFile)
01732                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
01733 
01734         Message msg;
01735 
01736         CmtFilePos pos =  m_logFile.getReadPosition();
01737         m_lastResult = m_logFile.readMessage(&msg);
01738         m_logFile.setReadPosition(pos);
01739 
01740         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01741         {
01742                 CMT3LOG("L3: peekLogMessageId, no messages to be read\n");
01743                 return m_lastResult;
01744         }
01745         messageId = msg.getMessageId();
01746         CMT3LOG("L3: peekLogMessageId found msg with ID %02x\n",(int32_t) messageId);
01747         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01748 }
01749 
01751 // Retrieve a data message.
01752 XsensResultValue Cmt3::readDataPacket(Packet* pack, bool acceptOther)
01753 {
01754         CMT3LOGDAT("L3: readDataPacket %p %u\n",pack,acceptOther?1:0);
01755         CMT3EXITLOGDAT;
01756 
01757         if (!m_readFromFile)
01758         {
01759                 while(1)
01760                 {
01761                         m_lastResult = m_serial.readMessage(&pack->m_msg);
01762                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01763                         {
01764                                 CMT3LOGDAT("L3: readDataPacket, no data messages to be read\n");
01765                                 return m_lastResult;
01766                         }
01767                         if (m_logging)
01768                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&pack->m_msg);
01769                         if (pack->m_msg.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_MTDATA)
01770                         {
01771                                 pack->setXbus(m_config.m_masterDeviceId != m_config.m_deviceInfo[0].m_deviceId,false);
01772                                 pack->m_itemCount = m_config.m_numberOfDevices;
01773                                 for (uint16_t i = 0;i < m_config.m_numberOfDevices;++i)
01774                                         pack->setDataFormat(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputMode,m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputSettings,i);
01775                                 pack->m_toa = timeStampNow();
01776                                 if (m_useRtc)
01777                                         fillRtc(pack);
01778                                 CMT3LOGDAT("L3: readDataPacket, data message read\n");
01779                                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01780                         }
01781                         else if (pack->m_msg.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
01782                         {
01783                                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
01784                                 if (pack->m_msg.getDataSize() >= 2)
01785                                 {
01786                                         uint8_t biddy = pack->m_msg.getDataByte(1);
01787                                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
01788                                 }
01789                                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) pack->m_msg.getDataByte(0);
01790                         }
01791                         CMT3LOGDAT("L3: readDataPacket, non-data message read: %2x\n",(int32_t) pack->m_msg.getMessageId());
01792                         if (acceptOther)
01793                         {
01794                                 CMT3LOGDAT("L3: accepting other message\n");
01795                                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OTHER;
01796                         }
01797                 }
01798         }
01799         else
01800         {
01801                 while(1)
01802                 {
01803                         m_lastResult = m_logFile.readMessage(&pack->m_msg);
01804                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01805                         {
01806                                 CMT3LOGDAT("L3: readDataPacket, no data messages to be read\n");
01807                                 return m_lastResult;
01808                         }
01809                         if (pack->m_msg.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_MTDATA)
01810                         {
01811                                 pack->setXbus(m_config.m_masterDeviceId != m_config.m_deviceInfo[0].m_deviceId,false);
01812                                 pack->m_itemCount = m_config.m_numberOfDevices;
01813                                 for (uint16_t i = 0;i < m_config.m_numberOfDevices;++i)
01814                                         pack->setDataFormat(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputMode,m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputSettings,i);
01815                                 pack->m_toa = timeStampNow();
01816                                 if (m_useRtc)
01817                                         fillRtc(pack);
01818                                 CMT3LOGDAT("L3: readDataPacket, data message read\n");
01819                                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01820                         }
01821                         else if (pack->m_msg.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
01822                         {
01823                                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
01824                                 if (pack->m_msg.getDataSize() >= 2)
01825                                 {
01826                                         uint8_t biddy = pack->m_msg.getDataByte(1);
01827                                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
01828                                 }
01829                                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) pack->m_msg.getDataByte(0);
01830                         }
01831                         CMT3LOGDAT("L3: readDataPacket, non-data message read: %2x\n",(int32_t) pack->m_msg.getMessageId());
01832                         if (acceptOther)
01833                         {
01834                                 CMT3LOGDAT("L3: accepting other message\n");
01835                                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OTHER;
01836                         }
01837                 }
01838         }
01839 }
01840 
01842 // Request a data message and wait for it to arrive.
01843 XsensResultValue Cmt3::requestData(Packet* pack, const uint8_t *data, const uint16_t count)
01844 {
01845         CMT3LOGDAT("L3: requestData %p\n",pack);
01846         CMT3EXITLOGDAT;
01847 
01848         if (isXm())
01849                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
01850         Message snd(CMT_MID_REQDATA);
01851         snd.setDataBuffer(data, 0, count);
01852         m_lastResult = m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01853         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01854                 return m_lastResult;
01855         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&pack->m_msg,CMT_MID_MTDATA,0,true);
01856         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01857                 return m_lastResult;
01858         for (uint16_t i = 0;i < m_config.m_numberOfDevices;++i)
01859                 pack->setDataFormat(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputMode, m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputSettings,i);
01860         if (m_logging)
01861                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&pack->m_msg);
01862         if (pack->m_msg.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
01863         {
01864                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
01865                 if (pack->m_msg.getDataSize() >= 2)
01866                 {
01867                         uint8_t biddy = pack->m_msg.getDataByte(1);
01868                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
01869                 }
01870                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) pack->m_msg.getDataByte();
01871         }
01872         return m_lastResult;
01873 }
01874 
01876 // Reset all connected sensors.
01877 XsensResultValue Cmt3::reset(void)
01878 {
01879         CMT3LOG("L3: reset\n");
01880         CMT3EXITLOG;
01881 
01882         Message snd(CMT_MID_RESET,0);
01883         Message rcv;
01884         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
01885         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
01886         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_RESETACK,0,false);
01887         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
01888                 return m_lastResult;
01889         if (m_logging)
01890                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
01891         m_measuring = true;
01892         refreshCache();
01893         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
01894 }

01943 
01945 // Set the baudrate and reconnect at the new baudrate if successful.
01946 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setBaudrate(const uint32_t baudrate, bool reconnect)
01947 {
01948         CMT3LOG("L3: setBaudrate %u %u\n",baudrate,reconnect?1:0);
01949         CMT3EXITLOG;
01950 
01951         uint8_t tmp;
01952         switch (baudrate)
01953         {
01954         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_9600:
01955                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_9K6;
01956                 break;
01957 //      case CMT_BAUD_RATE_14K4:
01958 //              tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_14K4;
01959 //              break;
01960         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_19K2:
01961                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_19K2;
01962                 break;
01963 //      case CMT_BAUD_RATE_28K8:
01964 //              tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_28K8;
01965 //              break;
01966         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_38K4:
01967                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_38K4;
01968                 break;
01969         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_57K6:
01970                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_57K6;
01971                 break;
01972 //      case CMT_BAUD_RATE_76K8:
01973 //              tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_76K8;
01974 //              break;
01975         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_115K2:
01976                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_115K2;
01977                 break;
01978         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_230K4:
01979                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_230K4;
01980                 break;
01981         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_460K8:
01982                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_460K8;
01983                 break;
01984         case CMT_BAUD_RATE_921K6:
01985                 tmp = CMT_BAUDCODE_921K6;
01986                 break;
01987         default:
01988                 return m_lastResult = XRV_BAUDRATEINVALID;
01989         }
01990 
01991         if (baudrate != m_baudrate) {
01992                 DO_DATA_SET_BID(CMT_MID_REQBAUDRATE,CMT_LEN_BAUDRATE,Byte,tmp,CMT_BID_MASTER);
01993 
01994                 if (reconnect)
01995                 {
01996                         CMT3LOG("L3: sending reset for reconnect\n");
01997                         // Reset devices on this port and reopen port @ new baudrate
01998                         Message sndReset(CMT_MID_RESET,0);
01999                         Message rcvReset;
02000                         sndReset.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
02001                         m_serial.writeMessage(&sndReset);
02002                         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcvReset,CMT_MID_RESETACK,0,false);
02003                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02004                                 return m_lastResult;
02005                         if (m_logging)
02006                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcvReset);
02007                         bool wasMeasuring = m_measuring;
02008                         m_measuring = true;
02009 
02010                         // XM needs time to reboot
02011                         if (isXm())
02012                                 msleep(750);
02013 
02014                         CMT3LOG("L3: reopening port at new baud rate\n");
02015 #ifdef _WIN32
02016                         int32_t port;
02017                         m_serial.getPortNr(port);
02018                         closePort(false);
02019                         m_lastResult = openPort(port,baudrate);
02020 #else
02021                         char portname[32];
02022                         m_serial.getPortName(portname);
02023                         closePort(false);
02024                         m_lastResult = openPort(portname, baudrate);
02025 #endif
02026                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02027                                 return m_lastResult;
02028                         if (wasMeasuring)
02029                                 gotoMeasurement();
02030                         return m_lastResult;
02031                 }
02032         }
02033 
02034         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02035 }

02062 // Set the complete device output mode of a device.
02063 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setDeviceMode (const CmtDeviceMode& mode, bool force, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
02064 {
02065         CMT3LOG("L3: setDeviceMode %04x %08x %u %u %08x\n",(uint32_t) mode.m_outputMode,(uint32_t) mode.m_outputSettings,(uint32_t) mode.m_sampleFrequency,force?1:0,deviceId);
02066         CMT3EXITLOG;
02067 
02068         CmtDeviceMode2 mode2;
02069         mode2.m_outputMode = mode.m_outputMode;
02070         mode2.m_outputSettings = mode.m_outputSettings;
02071         mode2.setSampleFrequency(mode.m_sampleFrequency);
02072 
02073         return setDeviceMode2(mode2, force, deviceId);
02074 }
02075 
02077 // Set the complete device output mode of a device.
02078 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setDeviceMode2 (const CmtDeviceMode2& mode, bool force, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
02079 {
02080         CMT3LOG("L3: setDeviceMode2 %04x %08x %u %u %u %08x\n",(uint32_t) mode.m_outputMode,(uint32_t) mode.m_outputSettings,(uint32_t) mode.m_period, (uint32_t)mode.m_skip,force?1:0,deviceId);
02081         CMT3EXITLOG;
02082 
02083         Message snd;
02084         Message rcv;
02085         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
02086         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID)
02087                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);
02088         
02089         //uint16_t period, skip;
02090         //mode.getPeriodAndSkipFactor(period, skip);
02091         uint16_t xperiod;
02092         //bool changed = false;
02093 
02094         bool xm = isXm();
02095         if (bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
02096         {
02097                 if (xm)
02098                 {
02099                         // set the device modes of all connected devices first
02100                         for (uint16_t i = 0; i < m_config.m_numberOfDevices;++i)
02101                                 if ((m_lastResult = setDeviceMode2(mode,force,m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_deviceId)) != XRV_OK)
02102                                         return m_lastResult;
02103                 }
02104                 bid = CMT_BID_MASTER;
02105         }
02106 
02107         // set sample frequency if this is an Xbus Master or the primary device
02108         if (deviceId == CMT_DID_BROADCAST || deviceId == m_config.m_masterDeviceId)
02109         {
02110                 m_period = mode.m_period;
02111                 m_skip = mode.m_skip;
02112                 //m_sampleFrequency = (double) mode.getSampleFrequency();
02113                 snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
02114                 if (xm)
02115                         xperiod = mode.m_period * (mode.m_skip + 1);
02116                 else
02117                         xperiod = mode.m_period;
02118 
02119                 if (force || m_config.m_samplingPeriod != xperiod)
02120                 {
02121                         CMT3LOG("L3: setDeviceMode setting device %08x period to %u\n",deviceId,(uint32_t) xperiod);
02122                         //changed = true;
02123                         snd.setDataShort(xperiod);
02124                         snd.setMessageId(CMT_MID_REQPERIOD);
02125                         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02126                         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQPERIODACK,0,true);
02127                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02128                                 return m_lastResult;
02129                         if (m_logging)
02130                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02131                         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02132                         m_config.m_samplingPeriod = xperiod;    // update device info
02133                 }
02134 
02135                 if (!xm && (force || m_config.m_outputSkipFactor != mode.m_skip))
02136                 {
02137                         CMT3LOG("L3: setDeviceMode setting MT %08x skip factor to %u\n",deviceId,(uint32_t) mode.m_skip);
02138                         //changed = true;
02139                         snd.setDataShort(mode.m_skip);
02140                         snd.setMessageId(CMT_MID_REQOUTPUTSKIPFACTOR);
02141                         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02142                         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQOUTPUTSKIPFACTORACK,0,true);
02143                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02144                                 return m_lastResult;
02145                         if (m_logging)
02146                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02147                         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02148                         m_config.m_outputSkipFactor = mode.m_skip;      // update device info
02149                 }
02150         }
02151 
02152         // set the output mode and settings if this device is not an Xbus Master
02153         if ((deviceId & CMT_DID_TYPEH_MASK) != CMT_DID_TYPEH_XM)
02154         {
02155                 if (bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST || bid == CMT_BID_MASTER) {
02156                         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
02157                         bid = 1;
02158                 }
02159                 else
02160                         snd.setBusId(bid);
02161         
02162                 if (force || m_config.m_deviceInfo[bid-1].m_outputMode != (uint16_t) mode.m_outputMode)
02163                 {
02164                         CMT3LOG("L3: setDeviceMode setting MT %08x output mode to %04X\n",deviceId,(uint32_t) mode.m_outputMode);
02165                         //changed = true;
02166                         snd.resizeData(2);
02167                         snd.setMessageId(CMT_MID_REQOUTPUTMODE);
02168                         snd.setDataShort((uint16_t) mode.m_outputMode);
02169                         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02170                         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQOUTPUTMODEACK,0,true);
02171                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02172                                 return m_lastResult;
02173                         if (m_logging)
02174                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02175                         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02176                         m_config.m_deviceInfo[bid-1].m_outputMode = (uint16_t) mode.m_outputMode;       // update device info
02177                 }
02178 
02179                 uint32_t settings = (uint32_t) mode.m_outputSettings;
02180                 if (xm)
02181                         settings &= ~(uint32_t) CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_TIMESTAMP_MASK;
02182 
02183                 if (force || m_config.m_deviceInfo[bid-1].m_outputSettings != settings)
02184                 {
02185                         CMT3LOG("L3: setDeviceMode setting MT %08x output settings to %08X\n",deviceId,(uint32_t) settings);
02186                         //changed = true;
02187                         snd.setMessageId(CMT_MID_REQOUTPUTSETTINGS);
02188                         snd.setDataLong(settings);
02189                         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02190                         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQOUTPUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02191                         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02192                                 return m_lastResult;
02193                         if (m_logging)
02194                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02195                         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02196                         m_config.m_deviceInfo[bid-1].m_outputSettings = settings;       // update device info
02197                 }
02198         }
02199 
02200         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02201 }
02202 
02204 // Retrieve the error mode
02205 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setErrorMode(const uint16_t mode)
02206 {
02207         CMT3LOG("L3: setErrorMode %u\n",(uint32_t) mode);
02208         CMT3EXITLOG;
02209 
02210         uint8_t mid;
02211         if (isXm())
02212                 mid = CMT_MID_REQXMERRORMODE;
02213         else
02214                 mid = CMT_MID_REQERRORMODE;
02215 
02216         DO_DATA_SET_BID(mid,CMT_LEN_ERRORMODE,Short,mode,CMT_BID_MASTER);
02217         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02218 }

02241 
02243 // Sets the current position of the sensor
02244 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setLatLonAlt(const CmtVector& lla, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
02245 {
02246         CMT3LOG("L3: setLatLonAlt [%f %f %f] %08x\n",lla.m_data[0],lla.m_data[1],lla.m_data[2],deviceId);
02247         CMT3EXITLOG;
02248 
02249         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
02250         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID || bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
02251                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);
02252 
02253         Message snd(CMT_MID_SETLATLONALT,CMT_LEN_LATLONALT);
02254         Message rcv;
02255         snd.setDataFloat((float) lla.m_data[0],0);
02256         snd.setDataFloat((float) lla.m_data[1],4);
02257         snd.setDataFloat((float) lla.m_data[2],8);
02258 
02259         snd.setBusId(bid);
02260         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02261         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_SETLATLONALTACK,0,true);
02262         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02263                 return m_lastResult;
02264         if (m_logging)
02265                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02266         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
02267         {
02268                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
02269                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
02270                 {
02271                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
02272                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
02273                 }
02274                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();
02275         }
02276         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02277 }

02300 
02301 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setObjectAlignmentMatrix(const CmtMatrix& matrix, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
02302 {
02303         CMT3LOG("L3: setObjectAlignmentMatrix ][%f %f %f][%f %f %f][%f %f %f]] %08x\n",
02304                 matrix.m_data[0][0],matrix.m_data[0][1],matrix.m_data[0][2],
02305                 matrix.m_data[1][0],matrix.m_data[1][1],matrix.m_data[1][2],
02306                 matrix.m_data[2][0],matrix.m_data[2][1],matrix.m_data[2][2],deviceId);
02307         CMT3EXITLOG;
02308 
02309         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
02310         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID || bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
02311                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);
02312 
02313         Message snd(CMT_MID_SETOBJECTALIGNMENT,CMT_LEN_OBJECTALIGNMENT);
02314         Message rcv;
02315         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[0][0],0);
02316         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[0][1],4);
02317         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[0][2],8);
02318         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[1][0],12);
02319         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[1][1],16);
02320         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[1][2],20);
02321         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[2][0],24);
02322         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[2][1],28);
02323         snd.setDataFloat((float) matrix.m_data[2][2],32);
02324 
02325         snd.setBusId(bid);
02326         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02327         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_SETOBJECTALIGNMENTACK,0,true);
02328         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02329                 return m_lastResult;
02330         if (m_logging)
02331                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02332         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
02333         {
02334                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
02335                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
02336                 {
02337                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
02338                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
02339                 }
02340                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();
02341         }
02342         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02343 }
02344 
02346 // Set the processing flags of a device.
02347 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setProcessingFlags (uint16_t processingFlags, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
02348 {
02349         CMT3LOG("L3: setProcessingFlags %u %08x\n",(uint32_t) processingFlags,deviceId);
02350         CMT3EXITLOG;
02351 
02352         DO_DATA_SET(CMT_MID_REQPROCESSINGFLAGS,CMT_LEN_PROCESSINGFLAGS,Short,processingFlags);
02353         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02354 }
02355 
02357 // Switch the XM off
02358 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setXmPowerOff(void)
02359 {
02360         CMT3LOG("L3: setXmPowerOff\n");
02361         CMT3EXITLOG;
02362 
02363         if (!isXm())
02364                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
02365         Message snd(CMT_MID_XMPWROFF,0);
02366         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
02367         return m_lastResult = m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02368 }
02369 
02371 // Set the inbound synchronization settings of a device.
02372 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setSyncInSettings (const CmtSyncInSettings& settings)
02373 {
02374         CMT3LOG("L3: setSyncInSettings %u %u %u\n",(uint32_t) settings.m_mode,settings.m_offset,(uint32_t) settings.m_skipFactor);
02375         CMT3EXITLOG;
02376 
02377         if (isXm())
02378                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
02379 
02380         Message snd(CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGS,3);
02381         Message rcv;
02382 
02383         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
02384 
02385         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCIN_MODE);
02386         snd.setDataShort(settings.m_mode,1);
02387         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02388         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02389         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02390                 return m_lastResult;
02391         if (m_logging)
02392                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02393         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02394 
02395         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCIN_SKIPFACTOR);
02396         snd.setDataShort(settings.m_skipFactor,1);
02397         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02398         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02399         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02400                 return m_lastResult;
02401         if (m_logging)
02402                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02403         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02404 
02405         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCIN_OFFSET);
02406         snd.setDataLong((uint32_t) (((double) settings.m_offset)
02407                 * CMT_SYNC_CLOCK_NS_TO_TICKS + 0.5),1);
02408         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02409         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCINSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02410         if (m_lastResult == XRV_OK)
02411         {
02412                 if (m_logging)
02413                         m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02414                 HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02415         }
02416 
02417         return m_lastResult;
02418 }

02526         CMT3EXITLOG;
02527 
02528         if (isXm())
02529                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
02530 
02531         Message snd(CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGS,3);
02532         Message rcv;
02533 
02534         snd.setBusId(CMT_BID_MASTER);
02535 
02536         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_MODE);
02537         snd.setDataShort(settings.m_mode,1);
02538         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02539         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02540         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02541                 return m_lastResult;
02542         if (m_logging)
02543                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02544         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02545 
02546         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_SKIPFACTOR);
02547         snd.setDataShort(settings.m_skipFactor,1);
02548         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02549         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02550         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02551                 return m_lastResult;
02552         if (m_logging)
02553                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02554         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02555 
02556         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_OFFSET);
02557         snd.setDataLong((uint32_t) (((double) settings.m_offset)
02558                                                                 * CMT_SYNC_CLOCK_NS_TO_TICKS + 0.5),1);
02559         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02560         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02561         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02562                 return m_lastResult;
02563         if (m_logging)
02564                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02565         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02566         
02567         snd.setDataByte(CMT_PARAM_SYNCOUT_PULSEWIDTH);
02568         snd.setDataLong((uint32_t) (((double) settings.m_pulseWidth)
02569                                                                 * CMT_SYNC_CLOCK_NS_TO_TICKS + 0.5),1);
02570         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02571         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQSYNCOUTSETTINGSACK,0,true);
02572         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02573                 return m_lastResult;
02574         if (m_logging)
02575                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02576         HANDLE_ERR_RESULT;
02577 
02578         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02579 }

02696 // Set the configuration mode timeout value in ms.

02698 {

02700         CMT3EXITLOG;
02701 
02702         m_timeoutConf = timeout;
02703         if (!m_measuring)
02704                 return m_lastResult = m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutConf);
02705         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02706 }

02713         CMT3EXITLOG;
02714 
02715         m_timeoutMeas = timeout;
02716         if (m_measuring)
02717                 return m_lastResult = m_serial.setTimeout(m_timeoutMeas);
02718         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02719 }
