02748 
02750 XsensResultValue Cmt3::refreshCache(const bool file)
02751 {
02752         CMT3LOG("L3: refreshCache %d\n",file?1:0);
02753         CMT3EXITLOG;
02754 
02755         if (m_serial.isOpen() && (!file || !m_logFile.isOpen()))
02756         {
02757                 // clear eMts cache
02758                 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < CMT_MAX_DEVICES_PER_PORT; ++i)
02759                 {
02760                         CHKFREENUL(m_eMtsData[i]);
02761                 }
02762 
02763                 // port open, go to configuration mode
02764                 if (m_measuring && gotoConfig() != XRV_OK)
02765                         return m_lastResult;            // m_lastResult is already set by gotoConfig()
02766 
02767                 // now in configuration mode, read device information
02768                 CMT3LOG("L3: refreshCache Device in configuration mode, reading device information\n");
02769                 
02770                 Message snd;
02771                 Message rcv;
02772                 
02773                 // all information is in the Configuration message
02774                 snd.setMessageId(CMT_MID_REQCONFIGURATION);
02775                 m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
02776                 if ((m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_CONFIGURATION,0,false)) != XRV_OK)
02777                         return m_lastResult;
02778                 if (m_logging)
02779                         m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
02780                 m_config.readFromMessage(rcv.getMessageStart());
02781 
02782                 m_period = m_config.m_samplingPeriod;
02783                 m_skip = m_config.m_outputSkipFactor;
02784                 //CmtDeviceMode2 mode;
02785                 //mode.setPeriodAndSkipFactor(m_config.m_samplingPeriod,m_config.m_outputSkipFactor);
02786                 //mode.m_period = m_config.m_samplingPeriod;
02787                 //mode.m_skip = m_config.m_outputSkipFactor;
02788                 //m_sampleFrequency = mode.getRealSampleFrequency();
02789 
02790                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02791         }
02792         else if (m_logFile.isOpen() && (file || !m_serial.isOpen()))
02793         {
02794                 // clear eMts cache
02795                 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < CMT_MAX_DEVICES_PER_PORT; ++i)
02796                 {
02797                         CHKFREENUL(m_eMtsData[i]);
02798                 }
02799 
02800                 // now in configuration mode, read device information
02801                 CMT3LOG("L3: refreshCache Reading device configuration information from file\n");
02802                 
02803                 Message rcv;
02804                 
02805                 if ((m_lastResult = m_logFile.readMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_CONFIGURATION)) != XRV_OK)
02806                         return m_lastResult;
02807                 m_config.readFromMessage(rcv.getMessageStart());
02808 
02809                 m_period = m_config.m_samplingPeriod;
02810                 m_skip = m_config.m_outputSkipFactor;
02811                 //CmtDeviceMode2 mode;
02812                 //mode.setPeriodAndSkipFactor(m_config.m_samplingPeriod,m_config.m_outputSkipFactor);
02813                 //mode.m_period = m_config.m_samplingPeriod;
02814                 //mode.m_skip = m_config.m_outputSkipFactor;
02815                 //m_sampleFrequency = mode.getRealSampleFrequency();
02816 
02817                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02818         }
02819         else
02820                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOFILEORPORTOPEN;
02821 }
02822 
02824 //      Wait for a data message to arrive.
02825 XsensResultValue Cmt3::waitForDataMessage(Packet* pack)
02826 {
02827         CMT3LOGDAT("L3: waitForDataMessage %p\n",pack);
02828         CMT3EXITLOGDAT;
02829 
02830         m_lastResult = XRV_TIMEOUTNODATA;
02831 
02832         uint32_t toEnd = (getTimeOfDay() + (uint32_t) m_timeoutMeas) % (XSENS_MS_PER_DAY);
02833         while(toEnd >= getTimeOfDay())
02834         {
02835                 m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&pack->m_msg,CMT_MID_MTDATA,0,true);
02836                 if (m_lastResult == XRV_OK)
02837                 {
02838                         if (m_logging)
02839                                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&pack->m_msg);
02840                         if (pack->m_msg.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
02841                         {
02842                                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
02843                                 if (pack->m_msg.getDataSize() >= 2)
02844                                 {
02845                                         uint8_t biddy = pack->m_msg.getDataByte(1);
02846                                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
02847                                 }
02848                                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) pack->m_msg.getDataByte(0);
02849                         }
02850 
02851                         pack->m_itemCount = m_config.m_numberOfDevices;
02852                         for (uint16_t i = 0;i < m_config.m_numberOfDevices;++i)
02853                                 pack->setDataFormat(m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputMode,m_config.m_deviceInfo[i].m_outputSettings,i);
02854                         pack->m_toa = timeStampNow();
02855                         if (m_useRtc)
02856                                 fillRtc(pack);
02857 
02858                         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
02859                 }
02860         }
02861         return m_lastResult;// = XRV_TIMEOUT;
02862 }
02863 
02865 XsensResultValue Cmt3::createLogFile(const char* filename, bool startLogging)
02866 {
02867         CMT3LOG("L3: createLogFile \"%s\" %u\n",filename?filename:"",startLogging?1:0);
02868         CMT3EXITLOG;
02869 
02870         if (!m_serial.isOpen())
02871                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOPORTOPEN;
02872         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
02873                 return m_lastResult = XRV_ALREADYOPEN;
02874         m_lastResult = m_logFile.create(filename);
02875         if (m_lastResult == XRV_OK)
02876         {
02877                 m_logging = true;
02878                 CmtDeviceConfiguration config; 
02879                 if (getConfiguration(config) == XRV_OK)
02880                 {
02881                         void* buffer = malloc(CMT_EMTS_SIZE*(m_config.m_numberOfDevices+1));
02882                         getEMtsData(buffer,CMT_DID_BROADCAST);
02883                         free(buffer);
02884                         m_logging = startLogging;
02885                 }
02886         }
02887 
02888         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02889         {
02890                 m_logFile.closeAndDelete();
02891                 m_logging = false;
02892         }
02893         return m_lastResult;
02894 }
02895 
02897 XsensResultValue Cmt3::createLogFile(const wchar_t* filename, bool startLogging)
02898 {
02899         CMT3LOG("L3: createLogFile \"%S\" %u\n",filename?filename:L"",startLogging?1:0);
02900         CMT3EXITLOG;
02901 
02902         if (!m_serial.isOpen())
02903                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOPORTOPEN;
02904         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
02905                 return m_lastResult = XRV_ALREADYOPEN;
02906         m_lastResult = m_logFile.create(filename);
02907         if (m_lastResult == XRV_OK)
02908         {
02909                 m_logging = true;
02910                 CmtDeviceConfiguration config; 
02911                 if (getConfiguration(config) == XRV_OK)
02912                 {
02913                         void* buffer = malloc(CMT_EMTS_SIZE*(m_config.m_numberOfDevices+1));
02914                         getEMtsData(buffer,CMT_DID_BROADCAST);
02915                         free(buffer);
02916                         m_logging = startLogging;
02917                 }
02918         }
02919 
02920         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
02921         {
02922                 m_logFile.closeAndDelete();
02923                 m_logging = false;
02924         }
02925         return m_lastResult;
02926 }

02929 XsensResultValue Cmt3::closeLogFile(bool del)
02930 {
02931         CMT3LOG("L3: closeLogFile %u\n",del?1:0);
02932         CMT3EXITLOG;
02933 
02934         m_logging = false;
02935         if (!m_logFile.isOpen())
02936                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOFILEOPEN;
02937         if (del)
02938                 return m_lastResult = m_logFile.closeAndDelete();
02939         else
02940                 return m_lastResult = m_logFile.close();
02941 }
02942 
02944 bool Cmt3::isLogFileOpen(const char* filename) const
02945 {
02946         CMT3LOG("L3: isLogFileOpen \"%s\"\n",filename?filename:"");
02947 
02948         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
02949         {
02950                 if (filename != NULL && filename[0] != 0)
02951                 {
02952                         char fn[CMT_MAX_FILENAME_LENGTH];
02953                         m_logFile.getName(fn);
02954                         if (_strnicmp(filename,fn,CMT_MAX_FILENAME_LENGTH) != 0)
02955                                 return false;
02956                 }
02957                 return true;
02958         }
02959         return false;
02960 }
02961 
02963 bool Cmt3::isLogFileOpen(const wchar_t* filename) const
02964 {
02965         CMT3LOG("L3: isLogFileOpen \"%S\"\n",filename?filename:L"");
02966 
02967         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
02968         {
02969                 if (filename != NULL && filename[0] != L'\0')
02970                 {
02971                         wchar_t fn[CMT_MAX_FILENAME_LENGTH];
02972                         m_logFile.getName(fn);
02973                         if (_wcsnicmp(filename,fn,CMT_MAX_FILENAME_LENGTH) != 0)
02974                                 return false;
02975                 }
02976                 return true;
02977         }
02978         return false;
02979 }
02980 
02982 XsensResultValue Cmt3::openLogFile(const char* filename)
02983 {
02984         CMT3LOG("L3: openLogFile \"%s\"\n",filename?filename:"");
02985         CMT3EXITLOG;
02986 
02987         m_logging = false;
02988         if (m_serial.isOpen())
02989                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
02990         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
02991                 return m_lastResult = XRV_ALREADYOPEN;
02992         m_lastResult = m_logFile.open(filename,true);
02993         if (m_lastResult == XRV_OK)
02994         {
02995                 if (refreshCache() == XRV_OK)
02996                         m_readFromFile = true;
02997                 else
02998                 {
02999                         m_logFile.close();
03000                         m_readFromFile = false;
03001                 }
03002         }
03003         return m_lastResult;
03004 }

03008 {
03009         CMT3LOG("L3: openLogFile \"%S\"\n",filename?filename:L"");
03010         CMT3EXITLOG;
03011 
03012         m_logging = false;
03013         if (m_serial.isOpen())
03014                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
03015         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
03016                 return m_lastResult = XRV_ALREADYOPEN;
03017         m_lastResult = m_logFile.open(filename,true);
03018         if (m_lastResult == XRV_OK)
03019         {
03020                 if (refreshCache() == XRV_OK)
03021                         m_readFromFile = true;
03022                 else
03023                 {
03024                         m_logFile.close();
03025                         m_readFromFile = false;
03026                 }
03027         }
03028         return m_lastResult;
03029 }
03030 
03032 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setDataSource(bool readFromFile)
03033 {
03034         CMT3LOG("L3: setDataSource %s\n",readFromFile?"file":"port");
03035         CMT3EXITLOG;
03036 
03037         if (readFromFile)
03038         {
03039                 m_logging = false;
03040                 if (m_logFile.isOpen())
03041                 {
03042                         m_readFromFile = true;
03043                         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03044                 }
03045                 m_readFromFile = false;
03046                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
03047         }
03048         if (m_serial.isOpen())
03049         {
03050                 m_readFromFile = false;
03051                 return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03052         }
03053         if (m_logFile.isOpen())
03054         {
03055                 m_readFromFile = true;
03056                 return m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDOPERATION;
03057         }
03058         m_readFromFile = false;
03059         return m_lastResult = XRV_NOFILEORPORTOPEN;
03060 }
03061 
03063 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setLogMode(bool active)
03064 {
03065         CMT3LOG("L3: setLogMode %u\n",active?1:0);
03066         CMT3EXITLOG;
03067 
03068         if (active && (m_readFromFile || !m_logFile.isOpen()))
03069                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOFILEOPEN;
03070         m_logging = active;
03071         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03072 }

03080         return m_lastResult = m_logFile.setReadPosition(0);

03084 XsensResultValue Cmt3::writeMessageToLogFile(const Message& msg)
03085 {
03086         CMT3LOG("L3: writeMessageToLogFile\n");
03087         CMT3EXITLOG;
03088 
03089         if (!m_logFile.isOpen())
03090                 return m_lastResult = XRV_NOFILEOPEN;
03091 
03092         return m_lastResult = m_logFile.writeMessage(&msg);
03093 }
03094 
03096 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getAvailableScenarios(CmtScenario* scenarios, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03097 {
03098         CMT3LOG("L3: getAvailableScenarios %p %08x\n",scenarios,deviceId);
03099         CMT3EXITLOG;
03100 
03101         DO_DATA_REQUEST(CMT_MID_REQAVAILABLESCENARIOS);
03102 
03103         char tp = 0;
03104         switch (deviceId & CMT_DID_TYPEH_MASK)
03105         {
03106         case CMT_DID_TYPEH_MTIG:
03107                 tp = '6';
03108                 break;
03109         case CMT_DID_TYPEH_MTI_MTX:
03110                 tp = '3';
03111                 break;
03112         }
03113 
03114         for (int i = 0; i < CMT_MAX_SCENARIOS_IN_MT; ++i)
03115         {
03116                 scenarios[i].m_type = rcv.getDataByte(0 + i*(1+1+CMT_LEN_SCENARIOLABEL));
03117                 scenarios[i].m_version = rcv.getDataByte(1 + i*(1+1+CMT_LEN_SCENARIOLABEL));
03118                 memcpy(scenarios[i].m_label,rcv.getDataBuffer(2 + i*(1+1+CMT_LEN_SCENARIOLABEL)),CMT_LEN_SCENARIOLABEL);
03119                 scenarios[i].m_label[CMT_LEN_SCENARIOLABEL] = 0;
03120                 scenarios[i].m_filterType = tp;
03121         }
03122         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03123 }
03124 
03125 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getScenario(uint8_t& scenarioType, uint8_t& scenarioVersion, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03126 {
03127         CMT3LOG("L3: getScenario %08x\n",deviceId);
03128         CMT3EXITLOG;
03129 
03130         DO_DATA_REQUEST(CMT_MID_REQSCENARIO);
03131         scenarioType = rcv.getDataByte(1);
03132         scenarioVersion = rcv.getDataByte(0);
03133         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03134 }
03135 
03136 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setScenario(const uint8_t scenarioType, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03137 {
03138         CMT3LOG("L3: setScenario %u %08x\n",(uint32_t) scenarioType,deviceId);
03139         CMT3EXITLOG;
03140 
03141         uint16_t scenario = (uint16_t) scenarioType;
03142         DO_DATA_SET(CMT_MID_SETSCENARIO,CMT_LEN_SETSCENARIO,Short,scenario);
03143         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03144 }

03165 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getGpsLeverArm(CmtVector& arm, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03166 {
03167         CMT3LOG("L3: getGpsLeverArm %08x\n",deviceId);
03168         CMT3EXITLOG;
03169 
03170         DO_DATA_REQUEST(CMT_MID_REQGPSLEVERARM);
03171         arm.m_data[0] = rcv.getDataFloat(0);
03172         arm.m_data[1] = rcv.getDataFloat(4);
03173         arm.m_data[2] = rcv.getDataFloat(8);
03174         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03175 }
03176 
03177 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getGpsStatus(CmtGpsStatus& status, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03178 {
03179         CMT3LOG("L3: getGpsStatus %08x\n",deviceId);
03180         CMT3EXITLOG;
03181 
03182         DO_DATA_REQUEST(CMT_MID_REQGPSSTATUS);
03183         for (uint16_t i = 0; i < CMT_MAX_SVINFO; ++i)
03184         {
03185                 status.m_svInfo[i].m_id = rcv.getDataByte(i*5+2);
03186                 status.m_svInfo[i].m_navigationStatus = rcv.getDataByte(i*5+3);
03187                 status.m_svInfo[i].m_signalQuality= rcv.getDataByte(i*5+4);
03188                 status.m_svInfo[i].m_signalStrength = rcv.getDataByte(i*5+5);
03189         }
03190         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03191 }
03192 
03193 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setGpsLeverArm(const CmtVector& arm, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03194 {
03195         CMT3LOG("L3: setGpsLeverArm [%f %f %f] %08x\n",arm.m_data[0],arm.m_data[1],arm.m_data[2],deviceId);
03196         CMT3EXITLOG;
03197 
03198         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
03199         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID || bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
03200                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);
03201 
03202         Message snd(CMT_MID_SETGPSLEVERARM,CMT_LEN_GPSLEVERARM);
03203         Message rcv;
03204         snd.setDataFloat((float) arm.m_data[0],0);
03205         snd.setDataFloat((float) arm.m_data[1],4);
03206         snd.setDataFloat((float) arm.m_data[2],8);
03207 
03208         snd.setBusId(bid);
03209         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
03210         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_SETGPSLEVERARMACK,0,true);
03211         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
03212                 return m_lastResult;
03213         if (m_logging)
03214                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
03215         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
03216         {
03217                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
03218                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
03219                 {
03220                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
03221                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
03222                 }
03223                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();
03224         }
03225         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03226 }
03227 
03228 XsensResultValue Cmt3::storeXkfState(const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03229 {
03230         CMT3LOG("L3: storeXkfState %08x\n",deviceId);
03231         CMT3EXITLOG;
03232 
03233         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
03234         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID || bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
03235                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);
03236 
03237         Message snd(CMT_MID_STOREXKFSTATE,CMT_LEN_STOREXKFSTATE);
03238         Message rcv;
03239 
03240         snd.setBusId(bid);
03241         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
03242         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_STOREXKFSTATEACK,0,true);
03243         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
03244                 return m_lastResult;
03245         if (m_logging)
03246                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
03247         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
03248         {
03249                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
03250                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
03251                 {
03252                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
03253                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
03254                 }
03255                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();
03256         }
03257         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03258 }

03260 XsensResultValue Cmt3::setReplayMode(uint8_t &replayMode, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03261 {
03262         CMT3LOG("L3: setReplayMode [%02x] %08x\n", replayMode, deviceId);
03263         CMT3EXITLOG;
03264 
03265         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
03266         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID || bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
03267                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);
03268 
03269         Message snd(CMT_MID_SETREPLAYMODE, CMT_LEN_SETREPLAYMODE);
03270         snd.setDataByte(replayMode & CMT_REPLAYMODE_MASK);
03271         snd.setBusId(bid);
03272         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
03273 
03274         Message rcv;
03275         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_SETREPLAYMODEACK,0,true);
03276         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
03277                 return m_lastResult;
03278         if (m_logging)
03279                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
03280         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
03281         {
03282                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
03283                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
03284                 {
03285                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
03286                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
03287                 }
03288                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();
03289         }
03290         else
03291         {
03292                 replayMode = rcv.getDataByte();
03293         }
03294         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03295 }
03296 
03297 XsensResultValue Cmt3::getReplayMode(uint8_t &replayMode, const CmtDeviceId deviceId)
03298 {
03299         CMT3LOG("L3: getReplayMode [%02x] %08x\n", replayMode, deviceId);
03300         CMT3EXITLOG;
03301 
03302         uint8_t bid = getBusIdInternal(deviceId);
03303         if (bid == CMT_BID_INVALID || bid == CMT_BID_BROADCAST)
03304                 return (m_lastResult = XRV_INVALIDID);
03305 
03306         Message snd(CMT_MID_REQREPLAYMODE);
03307         //snd.setDataByte(replayMode);
03308         Message rcv;
03309 
03310         snd.setBusId(bid);
03311         m_serial.writeMessage(&snd);
03312         m_lastResult = m_serial.waitForMessage(&rcv,CMT_MID_REQREPLAYMODEACK,0,true);
03313         if (m_lastResult != XRV_OK)
03314                 return m_lastResult;
03315         if (m_logging)
03316                 m_logFile.writeMessage(&rcv);
03317         if (rcv.getMessageId() == CMT_MID_ERROR)
03318         {
03319                 m_lastHwErrorDeviceId = m_config.m_masterDeviceId;
03320                 if (rcv.getDataSize() >= 2)
03321                 {
03322                         uint8_t biddy = rcv.getDataByte(1);
03323                         getDeviceId(biddy,m_lastHwErrorDeviceId);
03324                 }
03325                 return m_lastResult = m_lastHwError = (XsensResultValue) rcv.getDataByte();
03326         }
03327         else
03328         {
03329                 replayMode = rcv.getDataByte();
03330         }
03331         return m_lastResult = XRV_OK;
03332 }
